articles.author: Brian McGleenon
articles.title: Biden's brutal snub to EU as hopes of Western Alliance crushed - Daily Express
articles.description: JOE Biden's reputation with EU leaders is faltering because of his decision to focus on America's Asian allies with one of the bloc's leading officials warning that the move is 'not good for the West'.

articles.title: Climate education still a 'peripheral topic' in Southeast Asia's syllabus amid calls to make it compulsory - CNA
articles.description:

articles.content:
The lack of government-mandated climate education has opened the door to education entrepreneurs to fill a gap.

articles.title: What the fossilized footprints found last week say about early humans in North America - OregonLive
articles.description: The findings may shed light on a mystery that has long intrigued scientists: When did people first arrive in the Americas, after dispersing from Africa and Asia?
articles.content:
Fossilized footprints discovered in New Mexico indicate that early humans were walking across North America around 23,000 years ago, researchers reported Thursday.
The first footprints were found in… [+4232 chars]
